channel.title: Redirect Immunity Bug
channel.description:
#### As Invoker I tried to redirect Princess to myself the same night she WoW'd King and got reaped but I got message that she was immune to target changing, and King got the WoW instead of me.
#### I was suppose to get her wisp.
#### Redirect a wisping Princess to yourself the night she gets reaped and wisps somebody.
#### This made me lose the game.
I posted the output log on Discord. I also posted the output log for a previous game where I was Paladin but immune to target changing by another Invoker. At the moment Invoker is broken because of this since you will be executed for claiming Drunk ... your "debs" don't work.
Also sometimes phys and alch are redirect immune, no idea why.

item.title: Redirect Immunity Bug
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
In the case where I paladin and redirect immune, I wasn’t barriered and had not become immune

Read full topic

item.title: Redirect Immunity Bug
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
Maybe they were already occupied/debbed/redirected/jailed 3 times and they became immune for the rest of the game. That is known mechanics.

Read full topic

item.title: Redirect Immunity Bug
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
nope there was no CW that barriered her

Read full topic

item.title: Redirect Immunity Bug
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
As Invoker I tried to redirect Princess to myself the same night she WoW’d King and got reaped but I got message that she was immune to target changing, and King got the WoW instead of me.

I was suppose to get her wisp.

Redirect a wisping Princess to yourself the night she gets reaped and wisps somebody.

This made me lose the game.

I posted the output log on Discord. I also posted the output log for a previous game where I was Paladin but immune to target changing by another Invoker. At the moment Invoker is broken because of this since you will be executed for claiming Drunk … your “debs” don’t work.

Also sometimes phys and alch are redirect immune, no idea why.

Read full topic
